instruction: Create a Blueprint with an actor variable Target. On BeginPlay, check if Target is valid. If valid, print Target Found. If not, print No Target.
expected_dsl:
BLUEPRINT: BP_ValidCheck
PARENT: Actor
VAR Target: Actor = None
GRAPH: EventGraph
NODE n1: Event_BeginPlay
NODE n2: VariableGet [VarName=Target]
NODE n3: IsValid
NODE n4: Branch
NODE n5: PrintString [InString="Target Found"]
NODE n6: PrintString [InString="No Target"]
EXEC n1.Then -> n4.Execute
DATA n2.Value -> n3.Input [Object]
DATA n3.ReturnValue -> n4.Condition [Bool]
EXEC n4.True -> n5.Execute
EXEC n4.False -> n6.Execute
actual_dsl:
BLUEPRINT: BP_CheckTarget
PARENT: Actor
VAR Target: Actor = None
GRAPH: EventGraph
NODE n1: Event_BeginPlay
NODE n2: VariableGet [VarName=Target]
NODE n3: IsValid
NODE n4: Branch
NODE n5: PrintString [InString="Target Found"]
NODE n6: PrintString [InString="No Target"]
EXEC n1.Then -> n4.Execute
DATA n2.Value -> n3.Input [Object]
DATA n3.ReturnValue -> n4.Condition [Bool]
EXEC n4.True -> n5.Execute
EXEC n4.False -> n6.Execute }
raw_output:
BLUEPRINT: BP_CheckTarget
PARENT: Actor
VAR Target: Actor = None
GRAPH: EventGraph
NODE n1: Event_BeginPlay
NODE n2: VariableGet [VarName=Target]
NODE n3: IsValid
NODE n4: Branch
NODE n5: PrintString [InString="Target Found"]
NODE n6: PrintString [InString="No Target"]
EXEC n1.Then -> n4.Execute
DATA n2.Value -> n3.Input [Object]
DATA n3.ReturnValue -> n4.Condition [Bool]
EXEC n4.True -> n5.Execute
EXEC n4.False -> n6.Execute }

instruction: Create a Blueprint that on overlap casts to Character. If cast succeeds, print Player. If cast fails, print Not A Player.
expected_dsl:
BLUEPRINT: BP_SafeCast
PARENT: Actor
GRAPH: EventGraph
NODE n1: Event_ActorBeginOverlap
NODE n2: CastToCharacter
NODE n3: PrintString [InString="Player"]
NODE n4: PrintString [InString="Not A Player"]
EXEC n1.Then -> n2.Execute
DATA n1.OtherActor -> n2.Object [Actor]
EXEC n2.CastSucceeded -> n3.Execute
EXEC n2.CastFailed -> n4.Execute
actual_dsl:
BLUEPRINT: BP_CastCheck
PARENT: Actor
GRAPH: EventGraph
NODE n1: Event_ActorBeginOverlap
NODE n2: CastToCharacter
NODE n3: PrintString [InString="Player"]
NODE n4: PrintString [InString="Not A Player"]
EXEC n1.Then -> n2.Execute
DATA n1.OtherActor -> n2.Object [Actor]
EXEC n2.CastSucceeded -> n3.Execute
EXEC n2.CastFailed -> n4.Execute {

PARENT: Actor
GRAPH: EventGraph

EXEC n1.Then -> n2.Execute
DATA n1.OtherActor -> n2.Object [Actor]
EXEC n2.CastSucceeded -> n3.Execute
EXEC n2.CastFailed -> n4.Execute {

instruction: Create a Blueprint that on overlap, casts to Pawn. If the cast succeeds and the pawn is valid, get its location and print it.

GRAPH: EventGraph
NODE n1: Event_ActorBeginOverlap
NODE n2: CastToPawn
NODE n3: IsValid
NODE n4: Branch
NODE n5: GetActorLocation
NODE n6: PrintString
EXEC n1.Then -> n2.Execute
DATA n1.OtherActor -> n2.Object [Actor]
EXEC n2.CastSucceeded -> n4.Execute
DATA n2.AsCharacter -> n3.Input [Object]
DATA n3.ReturnValue -> n4.Condition [Bool]
EXEC n4.True -> n6.Execute
DATA n5.ReturnValue -> n6.InString [String]
actual_dsl:
BLUEPRINT: BP_OverlapLocation
PARENT: Actor
GRAPH: EventGraph
NODE n1: Event_ActorBeginOverlap
NODE n2: CastToPawn

NODE n4: Branch
NODE n5: GetActorLocation
NODE n6: PrintString
EXEC n1.Then -> n2.Execute
DATA n1.OtherActor -> n2.Object [Actor]
EXEC n2.CastSucceeded -> n4.Execute
DATA n2.AsPawn -> n3.Input [Object]
DATA n3.ReturnValue -> n4.Condition [Bool]
EXEC n4.True -> n6.Execute
DATA n5.ReturnValue -> n6.InString [String](stypy

instruction: Create a Blueprint that starts a timer on BeginPlay. The timer checks if a variable Target is valid. If valid, get distance to target and print it. If not valid, print Searching.
expected_dsl:
BLUEPRINT: BP_TargetTracker
PARENT: Actor
VAR Target: Actor = None
GRAPH: EventGraph
NODE n1: Event_BeginPlay
NODE n2: SetTimerByFunctionName [FunctionName="CheckTarget", Time=1.0, Looping=true]
NODE n3: Event_Custom [EventName=CheckTarget]
NODE n4: VariableGet [VarName=Target]
NODE n5: IsValid
NODE n6: Branch
NODE n7: GetDistanceTo
NODE n8: PrintString
NODE n9: PrintString [InString="Searching"]
EXEC n1.Then -> n2.Execute
EXEC n3.Then -> n6.Execute
DATA n4.Value -> n5.Input [Object]
DATA n5.ReturnValue -> n6.Condition [Bool]
EXEC n6.True -> n8.Execute
DATA n4.Value -> n7.OtherActor [Actor]
DATA n7.ReturnValue -> n8.InString [String]
EXEC n6.False -> n9.Execute
actual_dsl:
BLUEPRINT: BP_TimerCheckTarget
PARENT: Actor
VAR Target: Actor = None
GRAPH: EventGraph
NODE n1: Event_BeginPlay
NODE n2: SetTimerByFunctionName [FunctionName="CheckTarget", Time=0.25, Looping=true]
NODE n3: Event_CustomEvent [EventName=CheckTarget]
NODE n4: VariableGet [VarName=Target]
NODE n5: IsValid
NODE n6: Branch
NODE n7: GetDistanceTo
NODE n8: PrintString
NODE n9: PrintString [InString="Searching"]
EXEC n1.Then -> n2.Execute
EXEC n3.Then -> n6.Execute
DATA n4.Value -> n5.Input [Object]
DATA n5.ReturnValue -> n6.Condition [Bool]
EXEC n6.True -> n8.Execute
DATA n4.Value -> n7.OtherActor [Actor]
DATA n7.ReturnValue -> n8.InString [String]
EXEC n6.False -> n9.Execute }
raw_output:
BLUEPRINT: BP_TimerCheckTarget
PARENT: Actor
VAR Target: Actor = None
GRAPH: EventGraph
NODE n1: Event_BeginPlay
NODE n2: SetTimerByFunctionName [FunctionName="CheckTarget", Time=0.25, Looping=true]
NODE n3: Event_CustomEvent [EventName=CheckTarget]
NODE n4: VariableGet [VarName=Target]
NODE n5: IsValid
NODE n6: Branch
NODE n7: GetDistanceTo
NODE n8: PrintString
NODE n9: PrintString [InString="Searching"]
EXEC n1.Then -> n2.Execute
EXEC n3.Then -> n6.Execute
DATA n4.Value -> n5.Input [Object]
DATA n5.ReturnValue -> n6.Condition [Bool]
EXEC n6.True -> n8.Execute
DATA n4.Value -> n7.OtherActor [Actor]
DATA n7.ReturnValue -> n8.InString [String]
EXEC n6.False -> n9.Execute }

instruction: Create a Blueprint with an array variable Items. On BeginPlay, loop through Items with ForEachLoop. For each item, check IsValid before printing its name.
expected_dsl:
BLUEPRINT: BP_SafeArrayLoop
PARENT: Actor
VAR Items: Array<Actor>
GRAPH: EventGraph
NODE n1: Event_BeginPlay
NODE n2: VariableGet [VarName=Items]
NODE n3: ForEachLoop
NODE n4: IsValid
NODE n5: Branch
NODE n6: GetDisplayName
NODE n7: PrintString
EXEC n1.Then -> n3.Execute
DATA n2.Value -> n3.Array [Array]
EXEC n3.LoopBody -> n5.Execute
DATA n3.ArrayElement -> n4.Input [Object]
DATA n4.ReturnValue -> n5.Condition [Bool]
EXEC n5.True -> n7.Execute
DATA n3.ArrayElement -> n6.Target [Actor]
DATA n6.ReturnValue -> n7.InString [String]
actual_dsl:
BLUEPRINT: BP_SafeArrayLoop
PARENT: Actor
VAR Items: Array<Actor>
GRAPH: EventGraph
NODE n1: Event_BeginPlay
NODE n2: VariableGet [VarName=Items]
NODE n3: ForEachLoop
NODE n4: IsValid
NODE n5: Branch
NODE n6: PrintString
EXEC n1.Then -> n3.Execute
DATA n2.Value -> n3.Array [Array]
EXEC n3.LoopBody -> n5.Execute
DATA n3.ArrayElement -> n4.Input [Object]
DATA n4.ReturnValue -> n5.Condition [Bool]
EXEC n5.True -> n6.Execute
DATA n3.ArrayElement -> n6.InString [String] }
raw_output:
BLUEPRINT: BP_SafeArrayLoop
PARENT: Actor
VAR Items: Array<Actor>
GRAPH: EventGraph
NODE n1: Event_BeginPlay
NODE n2: VariableGet [VarName=Items]
NODE n3: ForEachLoop
NODE n4: IsValid
NODE n5: Branch
NODE n6: PrintString
EXEC n1.Then -> n3.Execute
DATA n2.Value -> n3.Array [Array]
EXEC n3.LoopBody -> n5.Execute
DATA n3.ArrayElement -> n4.Input [Object]
DATA n4.ReturnValue -> n5.Condition [Bool]
EXEC n5.True -> n6.Execute
DATA n3.ArrayElement -> n6.InString [String] }

instruction: Create a Blueprint that on pressing Fire spawns an actor. Check if spawn was valid. If yes print Spawned. If no print Spawn Failed.

NODE n5: Branch
NODE n6: PrintString [InString="Spawned"]
NODE n7: PrintString [InString="Spawn Failed"]

DATA n3.ReturnValue -> n4.Input [Object]
DATA n4.ReturnValue -> n5.Condition [Bool]
EXEC n5.True -> n6.Execute
EXEC n5.False -> n7.Execute

EXEC n5.False -> n7.Execute {

instruction: Create a Blueprint with an actor variable Enemy. On Tick, check if Enemy is valid. If valid and distance less than 300, print Danger.
expected_dsl:
BLUEPRINT: BP_EnemyProximity
PARENT: Actor
VAR Enemy: Actor = None
GRAPH: EventGraph
NODE n1: Event_Tick
NODE n2: VariableGet [VarName=Enemy]
NODE n3: IsValid
NODE n4: Branch
NODE n5: GetDistanceTo
NODE n6: LessThan [B=300.0]
NODE n7: Branch
NODE n8: PrintString [InString="Danger"]
EXEC n1.Then -> n4.Execute
DATA n2.Value -> n3.Input [Object]
DATA n3.ReturnValue -> n4.Condition [Bool]
EXEC n4.True -> n7.Execute
DATA n2.Value -> n5.OtherActor [Actor]
DATA n5.ReturnValue -> n6.A [Float]
DATA n6.ReturnValue -> n7.Condition [Bool]
EXEC n7.True -> n8.Execute
actual_dsl:
BLUEPRINT: BP_DistanceCheck
PARENT: Actor
VAR Enemy: Actor = None
GRAPH: EventGraph
NODE n1: Event_Tick
NODE n2: VariableGet [VarName=Enemy]
NODE n3: IsValid
NODE n4: Branch
NODE n5: GetDistanceTo
NODE n6: LessThan [B=300.0]
NODE n7: Branch
NODE n8: PrintString [InString="Danger"]
EXEC n1.Then -> n4.Execute
DATA n2.Value -> n3.Input [Object]
DATA n3.ReturnValue -> n4.Condition [Bool]
EXEC n4.True -> n7.Execute
DATA n2.Value -> n5.OtherActor [Actor]
DATA n5.ReturnValue -> n6.A [Float]
DATA n6.ReturnValue -> n7.Condition [Bool]
EXEC n7.True -> n8.Execute {
raw_output:
BLUEPRINT: BP_DistanceCheck
PARENT: Actor
VAR Enemy: Actor = None
GRAPH: EventGraph
NODE n1: Event_Tick
NODE n2: VariableGet [VarName=Enemy]
NODE n3: IsValid
NODE n4: Branch
NODE n5: GetDistanceTo
NODE n6: LessThan [B=300.0]
NODE n7: Branch
NODE n8: PrintString [InString="Danger"]
EXEC n1.Then -> n4.Execute
DATA n2.Value -> n3.Input [Object]
DATA n3.ReturnValue -> n4.Condition [Bool]
EXEC n4.True -> n7.Execute
DATA n2.Value -> n5.OtherActor [Actor]
DATA n5.ReturnValue -> n6.A [Float]
DATA n6.ReturnValue -> n7.Condition [Bool]
EXEC n7.True -> n8.Execute {

instruction: Create a Blueprint that on BeginPlay uses a Sequence. First output checks if variable A is valid. Second output checks if variable B is valid. Print the status of each.
expected_dsl:
BLUEPRINT: BP_MultiValidCheck
PARENT: Actor
VAR A: Actor = None
VAR B: Actor = None
GRAPH: EventGraph
NODE n1: Event_BeginPlay
NODE n2: Sequence
NODE n3: VariableGet [VarName=A]
NODE n4: IsValid
NODE n5: Branch
NODE n6: PrintString [InString="A Valid"]
NODE n7: PrintString [InString="A Invalid"]
NODE n8: VariableGet [VarName=B]
NODE n9: IsValid
NODE n10: Branch
NODE n11: PrintString [InString="B Valid"]
NODE n12: PrintString [InString="B Invalid"]
EXEC n1.Then -> n2.Execute
EXEC n2.Then_0 -> n5.Execute
DATA n3.Value -> n4.Input [Object]
DATA n4.ReturnValue -> n5.Condition [Bool]
EXEC n5.True -> n6.Execute
EXEC n5.False -> n7.Execute
EXEC n2.Then_1 -> n10.Execute
DATA n8.Value -> n9.Input [Object]
DATA n9.ReturnValue -> n10.Condition [Bool]
EXEC n10.True -> n11.Execute
EXEC n10.False -> n12.Execute
actual_dsl:
BLUEPRINT: BP_SequenceConditional
PARENT: Actor
VAR A: Object = None
VAR B: Object = None
GRAPH: EventGraph
NODE n1: Event_BeginPlay
NODE n2: Sequence
NODE n3: IsValid [Input=A]
NODE n4: Branch
NODE n5: PrintString [InString="A Valid"]
NODE n6: PrintString [InString="A Invalid"]
NODE n7: IsValid [Input=B]
NODE n8: Branch
NODE n9: PrintString [InString="B Valid"]
NODE n10: PrintString [InString="B Invalid"]
EXEC n1.Then -> n2.Execute
EXEC n2.Then_0 -> n4.Execute
DATA n3.ReturnValue -> n4.Condition [Bool]
EXEC n4.True -> n5.Execute
EXEC n4.False -> n6.Execute
EXEC n2.Then_1 -> n8.Execute
DATA n7.ReturnValue -> n8.Condition [Bool]
EXEC n8.True -> n9.Execute
EXEC n8.False -> n10.Execute }
raw_output:
BLUEPRINT: BP_SequenceConditional
PARENT: Actor
VAR A: Object = None
VAR B: Object = None
GRAPH: EventGraph
NODE n1: Event_BeginPlay
NODE n2: Sequence
NODE n3: IsValid [Input=A]
NODE n4: Branch
NODE n5: PrintString [InString="A Valid"]
NODE n6: PrintString [InString="A Invalid"]
NODE n7: IsValid [Input=B]
NODE n8: Branch
NODE n9: PrintString [InString="B Valid"]
NODE n10: PrintString [InString="B Invalid"]
EXEC n1.Then -> n2.Execute
EXEC n2.Then_0 -> n4.Execute
DATA n3.ReturnValue -> n4.Condition [Bool]
EXEC n4.True -> n5.Execute
EXEC n4.False -> n6.Execute
EXEC n2.Then_1 -> n8.Execute
DATA n7.ReturnValue -> n8.Condition [Bool]
EXEC n8.True -> n9.Execute
EXEC n8.False -> n10.Execute }

instruction: Create a Blueprint that on BeginPlay spawns an actor, checks if valid, and if so stores it in a variable SpawnedActor.
expected_dsl:
BLUEPRINT: BP_SpawnAndStore
PARENT: Actor
VAR SpawnedActor: Actor = None
GRAPH: EventGraph
NODE n1: Event_BeginPlay
NODE n2: GetActorLocation
NODE n3: SpawnActorFromClass [ActorClass=BP_Item]
NODE n4: IsValid
NODE n5: Branch
NODE n6: VariableSet [VarName=SpawnedActor]
NODE n7: PrintString [InString="Stored"]
EXEC n1.Then -> n3.Execute
DATA n2.ReturnValue -> n3.SpawnTransform [Transform]
EXEC n3.Then -> n5.Execute
DATA n3.ReturnValue -> n4.Input [Object]
DATA n4.ReturnValue -> n5.Condition [Bool]
EXEC n5.True -> n6.Execute
DATA n3.ReturnValue -> n6.Value [Actor]
EXEC n6.Then -> n7.Execute
actual_dsl:
BLUEPRINT: BP_SpawnAndCheck
PARENT: Actor
VAR SpawnedActor: Actor = None
GRAPH: EventGraph
NODE n1: Event_BeginPlay
NODE n2: GetVar [Variable=SpawnedActor]
NODE n3: IsValid
NODE n4: Branch
NODE n5: SetVar [Variable=SpawnedActor]
NODE n6: SpawnActorFromClass [ActorClass=WBP_DemoActor]
EXEC n1.Then -> n6.Execute
DATA n6.ReturnValue -> n5.Value [Actor]
EXEC n5.Then -> n4.Execute
DATA n5.Value -> n3.Input [Object]
DATA n3.ReturnValue -> n4.Condition [Bool]
EXEC n4.True -> n5.Execute
EXEC n4.False -> n2.Execute }
raw_output:
BLUEPRINT: BP_SpawnAndCheck
PARENT: Actor
VAR SpawnedActor: Actor = None
GRAPH: EventGraph
NODE n1: Event_BeginPlay
NODE n2: GetVar [Variable=SpawnedActor]
NODE n3: IsValid
NODE n4: Branch
NODE n5: SetVar [Variable=SpawnedActor]
NODE n6: SpawnActorFromClass [ActorClass=WBP_DemoActor]
EXEC n1.Then -> n6.Execute
DATA n6.ReturnValue -> n5.Value [Actor]
EXEC n5.Then -> n4.Execute
DATA n5.Value -> n3.Input [Object]
DATA n3.ReturnValue -> n4.Condition [Bool]
EXEC n4.True -> n5.Execute
EXEC n4.False -> n2.Execute }

instruction: Create a Blueprint that on overlap casts to Character. If cast succeeds, store the character in a variable LastPlayer and print Saved Player.

NODE n2: CastToCharacter

NODE n4: PrintString [InString="Saved Player"]

DATA n1.OtherActor -> n2.Object [Actor]
EXEC n2.CastSucceeded -> n3.Execute

EXEC n3.Then -> n4.Execute

instruction: Create a Blueprint that on pressing Fire checks if variable Target is valid. If valid, destroy Target and set Target to None. Print the result either way.
expected_dsl:
BLUEPRINT: BP_CleanDestroy
PARENT: Actor
VAR Target: Actor = None
GRAPH: EventGraph
NODE n1: Event_InputAction [ActionName="Fire"]
NODE n2: VariableGet [VarName=Target]
NODE n3: IsValid
NODE n4: Branch
NODE n5: DestroyActor
NODE n6: VariableSet [VarName=Target]
NODE n7: PrintString [InString="Destroyed"]
NODE n8: PrintString [InString="No Target"]
EXEC n1.Pressed -> n4.Execute
DATA n2.Value -> n3.Input [Object]
DATA n3.ReturnValue -> n4.Condition [Bool]
EXEC n4.True -> n5.Execute
DATA n2.Value -> n5.Target [Actor]
EXEC n5.Then -> n6.Execute
DATA None -> n6.Value [Actor]
EXEC n6.Then -> n7.Execute
EXEC n4.False -> n8.Execute
actual_dsl:
BLUEPRINT: BP_SafeDestroy
PARENT: Actor
VAR Target: Actor = None
GRAPH: EventGraph
NODE n1: Event_InputAction [ActionName="Fire"]
NODE n2: VariableGet [VarName=Target]
NODE n3: IsValid
NODE n4: Branch
NODE n5: DestroyActor

NODE n7: PrintString
NODE n8: PrintString
EXEC n1.Pressed -> n4.Execute
DATA n2.Value -> n3.Input [Object]
DATA n3.ReturnValue -> n4.Condition [Bool]
EXEC n4.True -> n5.Execute
DATA n2.Value -> n5.Target [Actor]
EXEC n5.Then_0 -> n6.Execute
DATA None -> n6.Value [Actor]
EXEC n4.False -> n7.Execute

EXEC n6.Then_0 -> n8.Execute

instruction: Create a Blueprint that on overlap first tries CastToCharacter. If that fails, try CastToPawn. If both fail, print Unknown Actor.
expected_dsl:
BLUEPRINT: BP_FallbackCast
PARENT: Actor
GRAPH: EventGraph
NODE n1: Event_ActorBeginOverlap
NODE n2: CastToCharacter
NODE n3: PrintString [InString="Character"]
NODE n4: CastToPawn
NODE n5: PrintString [InString="Pawn"]
NODE n6: PrintString [InString="Unknown Actor"]
EXEC n1.Then -> n2.Execute
DATA n1.OtherActor -> n2.Object [Actor]
EXEC n2.CastSucceeded -> n3.Execute
EXEC n2.CastFailed -> n4.Execute
DATA n1.OtherActor -> n4.Object [Actor]
EXEC n4.CastSucceeded -> n5.Execute
EXEC n4.CastFailed -> n6.Execute
actual_dsl:
BLUEPRINT: BP_CastSequence
PARENT: Actor
GRAPH: EventGraph
NODE n1: Event_ActorBeginOverlap
NODE n2: CastToCharacter
NODE n3: Branch
NODE n4: PrintString [InString="Cast to Character"]
NODE n5: CastToPawn
NODE n6: PrintString [InString="Cast to Pawn"]
NODE n7: PrintString [InString="Unknown Actor"]
EXEC n1.Then -> n2.Execute
DATA n1.OtherActor -> n2.Object [Actor]
EXEC n2.CastSucceeded -> n3.Execute
DATA true -> n3.Condition [Bool]
EXEC n3.True -> n4.Execute
EXEC n4.Then -> n5.Execute
DATA n1.OtherActor -> n5.Object [Actor]
EXEC n5.CastSucceeded -> n6.Execute
EXEC n6.Then -> n7.Execute
DATA false -> n3.Condition [Bool]
EXEC n3.False -> n7.Execute }
raw_output:
BLUEPRINT: BP_CastSequence
PARENT: Actor
GRAPH: EventGraph
NODE n1: Event_ActorBeginOverlap
NODE n2: CastToCharacter
NODE n3: Branch
NODE n4: PrintString [InString="Cast to Character"]
NODE n5: CastToPawn
NODE n6: PrintString [InString="Cast to Pawn"]
NODE n7: PrintString [InString="Unknown Actor"]
EXEC n1.Then -> n2.Execute
DATA n1.OtherActor -> n2.Object [Actor]
EXEC n2.CastSucceeded -> n3.Execute
DATA true -> n3.Condition [Bool]
EXEC n3.True -> n4.Execute
EXEC n4.Then -> n5.Execute
DATA n1.OtherActor -> n5.Object [Actor]
EXEC n5.CastSucceeded -> n6.Execute
EXEC n6.Then -> n7.Execute
DATA false -> n3.Condition [Bool]
EXEC n3.False -> n7.Execute }

validation.error:
Line 0: Found 2 parse errors:
Line 14: Invalid DATA syntax | 'DATA true -> n3.Condition [Bool]'
Line 20: Invalid DATA syntax | 'DATA false -> n3.Condition [Bool]' | ''

instruction: Create a Blueprint that on Tick gets the player pawn, checks if valid, then gets distance. If distance less than 500 and player is valid, print Alert.
expected_dsl:

GRAPH: EventGraph
NODE n1: Event_Tick
NODE n2: GetPlayerPawn
NODE n3: IsValid
NODE n4: Branch
NODE n5: GetDistanceTo
NODE n6: LessThan [B=500.0]
NODE n7: Branch
NODE n8: PrintString [InString="Alert"]
EXEC n1.Then -> n4.Execute
DATA n2.ReturnValue -> n3.Input [Object]
DATA n3.ReturnValue -> n4.Condition [Bool]
EXEC n4.True -> n7.Execute
DATA n2.ReturnValue -> n5.OtherActor [Actor]
DATA n5.ReturnValue -> n6.A [Float]
DATA n6.ReturnValue -> n7.Condition [Bool]
EXEC n7.True -> n8.Execute
